Can anyone tell me what the nosuid flag is for when I mount filesystems in fstab?
means that chmod +s doesn't work on the filesystem, which means applications can't run as root unless you're logged in as root
it's a security thing, but some programs need root permissions or they won't work, so you can't do it on your main filesystem
